properties.areaDesc: Northern Oxford; Central Somerset; Northern Franklin
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 2:41PM EST until January 26 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
...MIXED PRECIPITATION EXPECTED THROUGH TONIGHT...

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
up to 3 inches is possible in the higher terrain and ice
accumulations of around one tenth of an inch expected.

* WHERE...Northern Oxford, Northern Franklin and Central
Somerset Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation this afternoon into the early
evening will be initially light and patchy with a glaze of ice
possible over the cooler higher elevations. Steadier, heavier
precipitation arrives this evening and tonight, and while there
will be some snow precipitation will mix with sleet, freezing
rain, and rain at times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for
slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while
driving.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
